issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description: mapreduce-client-core fails to compile with java 1.6 on FreeBSD 10.
fields.environment:
$ uname -a
FreeBSD kakumen 10.0-STABLE FreeBSD 10.0-STABLE #4 r267707: Sat Jun 21 19:40:06 COT 2014     pfg@kakumen:/usr/obj/usr/src/sys/GENERIC  amd64
$ javac -version 
javac 1.6.0_32
$

comments.body: I think this should be closed, Hadoop 2.7.1 is in ports and seems to work.
